item.description:
Report X-2024031377

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on the dock with wet outer contents. Package was then placed in a salvage drum for further investigation. DescribePack: Upon investigation, it was found that there were two 1 gallon jugs inside of package, and one of them had a loose lid causing internal leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package was placed into a hazmat bag, and then into a salvage drum.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: A package handler discovered that the package was damp, and took it to QA for further processing. DescribePack: One inner jug had a loose cap. The bottom of the outer box was damp. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a lined hazmat tote and taken to the hazmat cage for further processing.

item.title: Report X-2024031304
item.description:
Report X-2024031304

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The actual sequences of events that lead to the spill incident are unknown, but once it was discovered action was taken to isolate the package in the hazmat processing cage away from those untrained for further inspection and processing. DescribePack: Package failed due to a loose cap which caused the package to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a hazardous materials tote with the lid sealed and placed into the hazmat processing cage away from the general area and everyone within it.

item.title: Report X-2024031319
item.description:
Report X-2024031319

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PKG WAS FOUND UNDER A NC BELT POST SORT. IT WAS SITTING ON PLASTIC BAG. SINCE IT WAS PLACED UPSIDE DOWN NOT KNOWINGLY, WHEN IT WAS MOVED MORE LIQUID STARTED TO COME OUT OF THE 1 OPEN JUG. BOX WAS QUICKLY PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG AND THEN MOVED TO A YELLOW DRUM AND SECURED FOR RESEARCH. DescribePack: 1 OF THE CAPS ON A JUG CAME OFF. UNSURE HOW THIS HAPPENED. IM SURE PKG WAS NOT PROPERLY HANDLED OR LOADED ACCORDING TO ORIENTATION ARROWS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PKG WAS PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG AND SECURED OFF THE DOCK

item.title: Report X-2024031309
item.description:
Report X-2024031309

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered when unloading a trailer from the CHAR HUB. Manager stopped the sort and with the assistance of QA isolated the package and brought it to the Hazmat processing area. DescribePack: Package was wet and torn due to one of the four bottles leaking as a result of a cap being loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a hazmat tote and brought to hazmat processing area. Absorbent was placed to gather the liquid within the trailer and on the floor.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PKG WAS BROUGH TO QA MID SORT WITH VISIBLE WETNESS ON THE OUTSIDES OF THE BOX. UNSURE HOW PKG LEAKED. PKG WAS PLACED IN YELLOW HAZMAT DRUM AND SECURED. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS ON JUGS INSIDE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PKG WAS PLACED UPRIGHT IN A YELLOW HAZMAT CONTAINER AND REMOVED FROM THE SORT TILL INSPECTION COULD BE DONE.

item.title: Report X-2024031194
item.description:
Report X-2024031194

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-19
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA due to it leaking when being loaded to a van. 1 of 4 items inside had a loose cap causing the spillage to leak onto the other 3 items and to eat through the box itself. Liquid was cleaned up in the area using absorbent pads and dry dirt. Actual package was placed inside a plastic bag then placed inside hazardous drum. DescribePack: Package cap was not on item properly and no seal was on item to separate the liquid portion from the cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Cap was tightened and entire package placed in hazardous drum.

item.title: Report X-2024031236
item.description:
Report X-2024031236

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-19
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The pkg was brought to QA2 by sort manager, due to the side of the box being severely wet. Upon inspection I discovered 1 out the 4 plastic bottles leaked out all contents and contaminated the entire box. I isolated this package in a lined hazmat tote, and moved it to the hazmat cage. DescribePack: 1 foil seal was broken which lead to the liquid spilling outside. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I responded quickly to the sort managers concerns over the leaking hazmat package. I moved the package to the hazmat cage after inspection.

item.title: Report X-2024030975
item.description:
Report X-2024030975

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: DURHAM
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver had taken the package out of the truck and the package was visibly wet, package handler had placed the wet package in the truck. After making sure there was no damages or injuries the packaged was opened and it was discovered that one of the items had a loose cap and had leaked out. The package was placed in a no spill container and placed at the spill containment platform for hazmats so then the proper procedures can be done. DescribePack: One of the items inside had a loose cap and that had caused the liquid inside the item to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a no spill container and the cap was retightened.

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found on dock with wet outer contents. Package was placed in salvage drum for further investigation. DescribePack: upon investigation, package was found to have had a leaking container due to a loose lid. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package was immediately placed into a hazmat bag, and then into a salvage drum.

  • City: CHARLOTTE

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The door was raised on the trailer and the box was sitting on its side. The box was soaked and leaking out on the bottom of the trailer. DescribePack: When the package was found on it is side. One of the caps had popped off and the contents leaked out. Two other bottles were on the verge of spilling out as well. The pressure was mainly at the caps on the bottles. DurationRel: 600 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken out of the trailer and put in a yellow bucket. The bucket was brought around to be written up at the QA station.
